title: Process a BOPIS Order
description: A customer places an order online for in-store pickup (BOPIS - Buy Online, Pick up In Store).

tasks.description: Receive the new BOPIS order and check local store inventory for the requested items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the local store has the items in stock.

tasks.description: Send a 'pick ticket' to the local store's staff to gather the items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transmits the order to the store's fulfillment system.

tasks.description: Once the store confirms the order is picked, send an 'Order Ready for Pickup' notification to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the correct notification to the customer.
